resources.string: You Are Not Playing Any Audio Right Now, Do You Still Wish to Continue?
Volume Guardian adjusts your volume when you are playing music in the background. Volume guardian is not useful when there is no music playing!
The application needs to access your microphone so that it knows when you start speaking. Once you start speaking, your music volume will be reduced automatically.
Volume Guardian Runs in the background and listens to you. As soon as it discovers someone is speaking, it reduces the music volume for better communication.
On the next screen, press the button with the speaker and minimize the application using home button
